nodes.text: Mirial was a cold and dry desert planet located in the Mirial system of the Outer Rim Territories. It was the homeworld of the near-human Mirialan species including the Jedi Master Luminara Unduli and her Padawan Barriss Offee. Unduli honored the traditions of the world by selecting a fellow Mirialan as her apprentice.

Mirial was created for the Star Wars Legends novel Cloak of Deception, which was written by James Luceno and released in 2001. It was confirmed to be canon by the reference book Ultimate Star Wars, which was released in 2015.[source?]
